First Department,

February, 1959 *

(February 19, 1959) In the Matter of Jacob Tim, Deceased. Vera Poses et al., Appellants; Fishel Rudawski et al., Respondents.

Not published with other decisions of Feb. 19, 1959, 7 A D 2d 905.— [Rep.

Motion granted to the extent and on the conditions stated in the order. Concur — Botein, P. J., Breitel, M. M. Frank, McNally and Stevens, JJ.
